entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: E 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
